ComicInfo.Title: Security Blanket Science; Peanuts On Ice; Cyrano Brown
ComicInfo.Summary:
With the science fair in full swing, Lucy knows exactly how to win that first place ribbon. While all the other kids will have rocks, bugs, and batteries, Lucy will be find a way to scientifically prove whether Linus’s blanket can truly bring him security.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Donna Almendrala (d, c) | 1 | RE | BOOM! Studios Exclusive First Appearance Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Nomi Kane (d) | 2 |

ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Rebecca Taylor, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Snoopy
